title: Tesla Is Expanding Its Footprint in Nevada
text: Tesla is investing $3.6 billion in Nevada for a battery factory capable of producing 100 gigawatt hours of 4680 batteries annually as well as a manufacturing plant for its new semi-truck.

title: Big factories, big trucks and big Musk: Tesla Q4 earnings expectations
text: Tesla's fourth-quarter and full-year 2022 earnings are upon us, and with it expectations from Wall Street for the electric vehicle maker to hit revenue for the quarter of $24.03 billion and adjusted earnings per share to land around $1.13, according to Yahoo Finance data.

title: Tesla says it plans $3.6 billion expansion of Nevada gigafactory
text: Tesla Inc. said Tuesday it plans to spend $3.6 billion to expand its Sparks, Nev., gigafactory where it currently makes batteries and electric-vehicle parts.

title: Tesla Pouring $3.6 Billion Into Nevada Plant For EV Battery, Semi Production
text: Tesla, the world's biggest producer of electric vehicles, is expanding its Nevada assembly plant with a major new investment to increase production of a new, larger type of battery cell and a dedicated factory to make its Semi truck.

title: Tesla is hiring 3,000 new workers and investing $3.6 billion to expand its Nevada Gigafactory
text: The additional investment in Tesla's Nevada facility comes as the EV maker has begun offering steep discounts on its Model 3 and Model & cars.

title: Musk tells court he lacked ‘specific' funding to take Tesla private
text: CEO of electric carmaker says finance was ‘not an issue' but he did not have binding commitments from investors

title: Tesla plans to spend $3.6 billion more on battery and truck manufacturing in Nevada
text: Tesla said in a statement that its expanding facilities in Nevada will include a 100 GWh battery cell factory and high-volume factory to manufacture the Semi.

title: Tesla to build all-electric Semi truck in Nevada
text: Automaker Tesla announced Tuesday it is investing $3.6 billion to build two new factories in Nevada, including a facility to mass produce its all-electric Class 8 Semi truck. “Semi is our fully electric combination truck, with 500 miles of range and energy consumption of less than 2 KWh per mile,” the company said on its website.

title: Tesla Eyes $3.6 Billion Factory Expansion
text: The auto maker plans to keep growing its lithium-ion battery and electric-truck businesses in Nevada.

title: Tesla Remains Consumers' Favorite Electric Vehicle Brand In The U.S.
text: Tesla, Inc. has bottomed at $130. Lucid Group, Inc. beats in terms of range and appearance, but not on volume nor the affordability factor.

title: Tesla Will Build Heavy Trucks at a New Factory in Nevada
text: The $3.6 billion investment, which also includes a new battery factory, presents a challenge to traditional truck makers that have been slow to sell electric vehicles.

title: Tesla to invest over $3.6 bln in Nevada to build two new factories
text: Tesla Inc said on Tuesday that it would invest more than $3.6 billion to build two new factories in the U.S. state of Nevada as it looks to ramp up production of its electric vehicles.

title: TSLA Reports Earnings on Wednesday as Firm Sees Optimism
text: Tesla (TSLA) will report its most recent earnings Wednesday this week amid ongoing scrutiny not only concerning its operations and business but CEO Elon Musk's escapades as the new owner of Twitter.

title: Wednesday Predictions: 3 Hot Stocks for Tomorrow
text: As we get into earnings season, the investment calendars are starting to fill up. That has investors wondering what the hot stocks for tomorrow will be.

title: Elon Musk Said Tesla Buyout Plan Didn't Involve ‘a Specific Number'
text: Under questioning, Mr. Musk said he hadn't discussed how much money investors would put in to help him take his car company private.

title: The Case for Selling Tesla
text: It all depends on whether you're trading for the short term or the long term.

title: Tesla's Gross-Profit Margin Is the Next Big Sticking Point
text: Tesla bulls and bears fight over just about everything. Next up is just how much the auto company's gross-profit margin will pull in.

title: ETFs in Focus Ahead of Tesla Q4 Earnings
text: Over the past three months, the stock shed about 32% compared to the industry's average loss of 16%. The weak trend will reverse only if the carmaker beats on earnings estimate.

title: Elon Musk needs to soothe investor fears over his Twitter saga as Tesla faces one of the most important moments in the history of the company, Wedbush says
text: Tesla stock is still poised for upside, but Elon Musk needs to comfort investors about his chaotic Twitter takeover, Wedbush's Dan Ives said.

title: JPMorgan ‘hates Tesla and me,' Musk says in court
text: Tesla Inc. TSLA Chief Executive Elon Musk on Tuesday shed more light onto the often-acrimonious dealings between the EV maker and JPMorgan Chase & Co. JPM Musk said in a federal trial over his “funding secured” tweets on Tuesday that the relationship between Tesla and bankers at JP Morgan is “very negative,” and that Musk decided to take away all of Tesla's commercial-banking business from JP Morgan. Musk also said that he has asked Chief Executive Jamie Dimon for support for Tesla, but that Dimon had declined to provide that support.

title: Elon Musk Trial: Tesla CEO Says ‘I Thought I Was Doing The Right Thing' In Testimony Over Tweet
text: Musk said he intended to make sure “all shareholders were aware of taking private and not just a few big shareholders.”

title: Tesla Pulls Back Due To High Volatility In The General Market: What's Happening?
text: Tesla, Inc TSLA opened slightly lower with an inside bar pattern on Tuesday before popping up to break above Monday's high-of-day, where the stock bumped into resistance.

title: Tesla earnings will be ‘most important' in history, Tesla bull says
text: Tesla Inc. is slated to report fourth-quarter earnings after the bell Wednesday, and a known Tesla bull is calling the report “one of the most important in history,” both for the EV maker and Chief Executive Elon Musk.

title: Cathie Wood Goes Bargain Hunting: 3 Stocks She Just Bought
text: The growth-focused money manager is making moves.

title: Elon Musk to return for third day of testimony in Tesla ‘funding secured' trial
text: Tesla Inc. Chief Executive Elon Musk will return to a San Francisco court Tuesday for a final stretch of testimony in a federal trial over alleged investor losses caused by his “funding secured” and other tweets back in 2018.

title: Tesla Stock Rebounds In January With Earnings Due
text: Tesla has shot up around 15% since it hit Jan. 6 lows. Tesla Q4 earnings are now due.

title: TSLA Stock Forecast: Where Will Tesla Be in 5 Years?
text: Without a doubt, Ark Investment Management CEO Cathie Wood has received criticism for sticking to her optimistic position in electric vehicle (EV) manufacturer Tesla (NASDAQ: TSLA ). Yet, Wood isn't giving up on TSLA stock.

title: Buy Tesla stock ahead of the EV maker's earnings as the softer demand story is largely priced in, analyst says
text: Tesla stock had a bad run in 2022 but now's the time to buy, Canaccord Genuity senior analyst George Gianarikas said this week.

title: Elon Musk on Saudi 'ass-covering' and 8 other things the Tesla boss said to defend himself in the 'funding secured' trial
text: Elon Musk has given testimony in a trial over allegations of securities fraud. Here are 9 things we've learned about the Tesla boss and the "funding secured" tweet.

title: Tesla's Stock Has Nosedived Since Elon Musk Took Over Twitter. Now We Find Out Why
text: Musk's banning journalists and spreading conspiracy theories has eroded much of the billionaire's goodwill in tech and beyond.

title: Could Price Cuts Actually Be a Genius Move for Tesla?
text: Tesla is cutting prices on its most popular models. What does this mean for the company and its shareholders?

title: Elon Musk says he counted on cashing in SpaceX stock to take Tesla private when he tweeted 'funding secured'
text: Elon Musk testified that "SpaceX stock alone meant 'funding secured' by itself" in an attempt to defend his 2018 tweet.

title: Steer clear of Tesla with disappointing earnings set to drag the stock lower, strategist Gene Munster says
text: Tesla shares rallied 7.7% Monday with Model Y price cuts juicing demand, but Deepwater's Gene Munster expects it to post disappointing profit Wednesday.

title: Elon Musk's trial over his Tesla 'funding-secured' tweets is underway. Here's everything you need to know about the case.
text: The civil lawsuit is seeking unspecified damages, but the investors said the tweets cost them "billions."
